sourceDesc.bibl:
BRADFORD Guillaume, Chronological, and historical retrospect of the memorable events of the war in the Peninsula from thè embarkation of the Prince Regent of Portugal to the Brazils, and the imprisonment of the King of Spain in France. Collected and anexed as a supplemental addition to the Rev. William Bradford views etc., London 1813.
BRADFORD, Sketches of the country, character, and costume in Portugal, and Spain Made during the campaign and on the route of the british armyn: 1808 and 1809. Engraved and coloured from the drawing: by the Rev. William Bradford, Wall incidental illustration et appropriate descriptions of each subject, London 1812, Plat 54, fol. gr. Il testo è inglese e francese e l’edizione è fatta con molto lusso di tavole e di tipi. Tutti i rami sono miniati in colori con gusto, non vi si riconosce troppo nell’opera la superficialità della speculazione libraria.

titleStmt.title: Revue historique et chronologique des événements mémorables de la guerre dans la Péninsule .. [microform]= Chronological and historical retrospect of the memorable events of the war in the Peninsula : from the embarkation of the Prince Regent of Portugal to the Brazils and the imprisonment of the King of Spain in France / collected and anexed [sic] as a supplemental addition to William Bradford's Views, &c.

publicationStmt.authority: Bradford, William, 1779 or 1780-1857. Sketches of the country, character, and costume, in Portugal and Spain.

monogr.title: Revue historique et chronologique des événements mémorables de la guerre dans la Péninsule .. [microform]= Chronological and historical retrospect of the memorable events of the war in the Peninsula : from the embarkation of the Prince Regent of Portugal to the Brazils and the imprisonment of the King of Spain in France / collected and anexed [sic] as a supplemental addition to William Bradford's Views, &c.

titleStmt.title: Esquisse du pays, du caractère et du costume, en Portugal et en Espagne, prises pendant la campagne et durant la marche de l'armée angloise, en 1808 en 1809 .. [microform]= Sketches of the country, character, and costume, in Portugal and Spain, made during the campaign, and on the route of the British army, in 1808 and 1809 / engraved and coloured from the drawings by William Bradford ; with incidental illustration, & appropriate descriptions, of each subject.

monogr.title: Esquisse du pays, du caractère et du costume, en Portugal et en Espagne, prises pendant la campagne et durant la marche de l'armée angloise, en 1808 en 1809 .. [microform]= Sketches of the country, character, and costume, in Portugal and Spain, made during the campaign, and on the route of the British army, in 1808 and 1809 / engraved and coloured from the drawings by William Bradford ; with incidental illustration, & appropriate descriptions, of each subject.

imprint.publisher: London : Printed for J. Booth, by B. R. Howlett
